name: react-native-custom-forms
description: Form helper for React Native apps with custom UI

scripts.coveralls: cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=text-lcov mocha --exit test/**/*.js | coveralls
scripts.install-peers: node -e "const peers = Object.entries(require('./package.json').peerDependencies || {}).map(d => d.join('@')).join(' '); if (peers.length) process.stdout.write('yarn add -P --no-lockfile ' + String(peers));" | sh

author: Alexandre Vicente <avicente@medicinaesolutions.com>
